title: Documents sealed upon filing
context: [ยง560:1-311] Documents sealed upon filing. In any action or proceeding under this chapter in the circuit court having jurisdiction in matters relating to the affairs of decedents, the following documents shall be sealed upon filing: (1) Birth certificate; (2) Marriage certificate; (3) Death certificate; (4) Tax return; (5) Kokua kanawai&rsquo;s report; (6) Court-ordered professional evaluation; and (7) Responses and objections to a kokua kanawai&rsquo;s report or a professional evaluation. The foregoing documents shall remain sealed unless otherwise ordered by the court; provided that the clerk, without further court order, may unseal and provide a copy of a report or evaluation pursuant to section 560:5-307 or 560:5-407. [L 2006, c 8, ยง1]
